DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the hemoglobin results obtained with the Masimo SpHb™ device and the Clinical Laboratory.
DOC.brief_title: Hemoglobin Measured by MASIMO SpHb™ Device and Laboratory Measurement
DOC.criteria: emergency unit patients, PACU (postanaesthesia care unit) and ICU patients requiring an hemoglobin determination
